Package hr.fer.zemris.java.hw12.jvdraw

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColorChangeListener
    Listener for the ColorProvider.
    ColorProvider
    Provides color to all subscribed ColorChangeListener listeners.
    DrawingModel
    Represents model for vector drawings.
    DrawingModelListener
    Listens for changes in drawing to which it is subscribed.
    DrawingModificationListener
    Listener which is notified when state of modification of the drawing, to which it is subscribed, is modified.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Drawing
    Vector graphics drawing.
    DrawingObjectListModel
    List model implementing model for list of all GeometricObject objects contained in the drawing.
    JColorArea
    Component used for picking color.
    JColorInfo
    Bar containing information about currently selected foreground and background colors.
    JDrawingCanvas
    Drawing canvas for drawing vector graphics.
    JGeometricList
    List of geometric objects contained in vector drawing.
    JVDraw
    JVDraw is a simple GUI application for drawing vector graphics.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DrawingException
    Thrown when exceptions in handling drawings of type Drawing occur.
